verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah; <S%H5146><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to them after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japheth <S%H3315><s%> [were] Gomer <S%H1586><s%> and Magog <S%H4031><s%> and Madai <S%H4074><s%> and Javan <S%H3120><s%> and Tubal <S%H8422><s%> and Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tiras. <S%H8494><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gomer <S%H1586><s%> [were] Ashkenaz <S%H813><s%> and Riphath <S%H7384><s%> and Togarmah. <S%H8425><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Javan <S%H3120><s%> [were] Elishah <S%H473><s%> and Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> Kittim <S%H3794><s%> and Dodanim. <S%H1721><s%>

From these <S%H428><s%> the coastlands <S%H339><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> were separated <S%H6504><s%> into their lands, <S%H776><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> according to his language, <S%H3956><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> into their nations. <S%H1471><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%> [were] Cush <S%H3568><s%> and Mizraim <S%H4714><s%> and Put <S%H6316><s%> and Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%> [were] Seba <S%H5434><s%> and Havilah <S%H2341><s%> and Sabtah <S%H5454><s%> and Raamah <S%H7484><s%> and Sabteca; <S%H5455><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Raamah <S%H7484><s%> [were] Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan. <S%H1719><s%>
Now Cush <S%H3568><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nimrod; <S%H5248><s%> he became <S%H2490><s%> <S%H1961><s%> a mighty <S%H1368><s%> one <S%H1368><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He was a mighty <S%H1368><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> it is said, <S%H559><s%> "Like Nimrod <S%H5248><s%> a mighty <S%H1368><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

And the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his kingdom <S%H4467><s%> was Babel <S%H894><s%> and Erech <S%H751><s%> and Accad <S%H390><s%> and Calneh, <S%H3641><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar. <S%H8152><s%>
From that land <S%H776><s%> he went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> and Rehoboth-Ir and Calah, <S%H3625><s%>
and Resen <S%H7449><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> and Calah; <S%H3625><s%> that is the great <S%H1419><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>
And Mizraim <S%H4714><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ludim <S%H3866><s%> and Anamim <S%H6047><s%> and Lehabim <S%H3853><s%> and Naphtuhim <S%H5320><s%>
and Pathrusim <S%H6625><s%> and Casluhim <S%H3695><s%> (from which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>) and Caphtorim. <S%H3732><s%>
And Canaan <S%H3667><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> his first-born, and Heth <S%H2845><s%>
and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> and the Amorite <S%H567><s%> and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%>
and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Arkite <S%H6208><s%> and the Sinite <S%H5513><s%>

and the Arvadite <S%H721><s%> and the Zemarite <S%H6786><s%> and the Hamathite; <S%H2577><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> were spread <S%H6327><s%> abroad.

And the territory <S%H1366><s%> of the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> extended <S%H1961><s%> from Sidon <S%H6721><s%> as you go <S%H935><s%> toward Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Gaza; <S%H5804><s%> as you go <S%H935><s%> toward Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> and Admah <S%H126><s%> and Zeboiim, <S%H6636><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Lasha. <S%H3962><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham, <S%H2526><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> according to their languages, <S%H3956><s%> by their lands, <S%H776><s%> by their nations. <S%H1471><s%>

And also <S%H1571><s%> to Shem, <S%H8035><s%> the father of all <S%H1><s%> the children <S%H3605><s%> of Eber, <S%H1121><s%> [and] the older <S%H5677><s%> brother <S%H1419><s%> of Japheth, <S%H251><s%> children were born. <S%H3315><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%> [were] Elam <S%H5867><s%> and Asshur <S%H804><s%> and Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> and Lud <S%H3865><s%> and Aram. <S%H758><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aram <S%H758><s%> [were] Uz <S%H5780><s%> and Hul <S%H2343><s%> and Gether <S%H1666><s%> and Mash. <S%H4851><s%>
And Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shelah; <S%H7974><s%> and Shelah <S%H7974><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eber. <S%H5677><s%>

And two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to Eber; <S%H5677><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> [was] Peleg, <S%H6389><s%> for in his days <S%H3117><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> was divided; <S%H6385><s%> and his brother's name <S%H8034><s%> [was] Joktan. <S%H3355><s%>
And Joktan <S%H3355><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Almodad <S%H486><s%> and Sheleph <S%H8026><s%> and Hazarmaveth <S%H2700><s%> and Jerah <S%H3392><s%>
and Hadoram <S%H1913><s%> and Uzal <S%H187><s%> and Diklah <S%H1853><s%>
and Obal <S%H5745><s%> and Abimael <S%H39><s%> and Sheba <S%H7614><s%>
and Ophir <S%H211><s%> and Havilah <S%H2341><s%> and Jobab; <S%H3103><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joktan. <S%H3355><s%>

Now their settlement <S%H4186><s%> extended <S%H1961><s%> from Mesha <S%H4852><s%> as you go <S%H935><s%> toward Sephar, <S%H5611><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem, <S%H8035><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> according to their languages, <S%H3956><s%> by their lands, <S%H776><s%> according to their nations. <S%H1471><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah, <S%H5146><s%> according to their genealogies, <S%H8435><s%> by their nations; <S%H1471><s%> and out of these <S%H428><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> were separated <S%H6504><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood. <S%H3999><s%>
